Description:
Exception is thrown out when hyperlink to a valid report document.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071214-1345

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report hyperlink to the attached repor document.
2. Preview, click the link.

Expected result:
No exception. 

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
